channel.title: Awesome online recreation of the first mission to the moon.
channel.description:
[url]https://www.wechoosethemoon.org/[/url]
Stumbled across this earlier today and it's really impressive.
The site is composed of eleven stages that feature animation, archival photos, video and actual mission audio that really bring Apollo 11 to life in a fantastic way.
Check it out, it's really awesome!

item.title: Awesome online recreation of the first mission to the moon.
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
It would have been more realistic if they put you in charge of the soundstage or at least the script.

Read full topic
item.source: Awesome online recreation of the first mission to the moon.
